activity.header: What do you want to do?

authority-number-renew-vary.header: What's the current authority and reference numbers?
authority-number-renew-vary.summary-header: Help with authority and reference numbers
authority-number-renew-vary.details:
The current authority number will be replaced with a new number once the renewal or variation is approved.
The reference number is a unique number for the company or individual that never changes.

company-name.header: What type of organisation is the authority for?

handle.header: What will be handled under the authority?

obtain.header: How will the prohibited items be obtained?

storage.header: Will the prohibited items be stored on the premises?

usage.header: What will be done with the prohibited items?

weapons.header: Which categories do the weapons/component parts fall under?
weapons.intro: Select all that apply and state the maximum quantities held at any one time. The quantities should reflect the supporting evidence provided, and be as accurate as possible. If the sections and quantities aren't backed up by the evidence you have provided, it may delay the application or result in the authority not being approved.

ammunition.header: Which categories does the prohibited ammunition fall under?
ammunition.intro: Select all that apply and state the maximum quantities held at any one time. The quantities should reflect the supporting evidence provided, and be as accurate as possible. If the sections and quantities aren't backed up by the evidence you have provided, it may delay the application or result in the authority not being approved.

address.cantfind: I can't find the address on the list

postcode-api.not-found: Sorry – we couldn’t find any addresses for that postcode, enter your address manually
postcode-api.cant-connect: Sorry – we couldn’t connect to the postcode lookup service at this time, enter your address manually

authority-holders.header: How many individuals will be named on the authority?

authority-holders.one: What's the full name of the authority holder?
authority-holders.two: What's the full name of the first authority holder?

second-authority-holders-name.header: What's the full name of the second authority holder?

contact.header: Who do we contact about this application?

storage-postcode.header: Where will the prohibited items be stored?
storage-postcode.intro: You can add further addresses later, if required. The police will inspect the storage arrangements at each location.

storage-address-lookup.header: Where will the prohibited items be stored?
storage-address-lookup.intro: You can add further addresses later, if required. The police will inspect the storage arrangements at each location.

storage-address.header: Where will the prohibited items be stored?
storage-address.intro: You can add further addresses later, if required. The police will inspect the storage arrangements at each location.

contact-details.intro: A confirmation email of this application will be sent to this address.
